channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s how Apple’s stock could transform from AI laggard into a big winner
item.description: Hardware providers like Apple are poised to become ‘key winners’ of the AI revolution, according to Bernstein.

item.title: Builders ramp up price cuts on new homes to five-year high. They’re hoping a rate cut will rescue them.
item.description: Home builders are looking forward to a rate cut by the Federal Reserve, the National Association of Home Builders said.

item.title: ‘I am highly alarmed by the proposed changes to retirement accounts’: I don’t want bitcoin or private equity in my 401(k). What can I do?
item.description: “What are the options for safeguarding my autonomy over my funds?”

item.title: The FIFA World Cup ticket presale is live. What to know about dynamic pricing, lotteries and sale dates while trying to score seats.
item.description: Plus, advice on when is the best time to buy World Cup tickets with dynamic pricing in play: “There are deals to be had.”

item.title: Markets are pricing in three rate cuts by year-end. Here’s where to put your money.
item.description: A rate cut at the September Fed meeting looks like a done deal. Be careful with stocks and watch the dollar.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
